mods.author: Shinya Ishikawa
mods.title: Pomodoro Timer
mods.description: A Pomodoro timer with Party Parrot. Pomodoro timers break work into intervals with short breaks in between to help keep you focused.

mods.author: Shinya Ishikawa
mods.title: Counter
mods.description: A simple counter. Tap the A button to increment the count by 1.

mods.author: Shinya Ishikawa
mods.title: Logos
mods.description: Tap the A button to toggle between displaying the JavaScript logo and Moddable logo.

mods.author: Shinya Ishikawa
mods.title: Bongo Cat
mods.description: Bongo Cat! Strike hard! Tap the A button and C button to hit the bongo, and the B button to meow.

mods.author: Shinya Ishikawa
mods.title: Life
mods.description: The Game of Life by John Horton Conway
